title: Milos Raonic Says Goodbye to Tennis
summary: Milos Raonic, a famous tennis player from Canada, has decided to stop playing tennis, which is called retirement. He is 35 years old and was very good at tennis, especially with his strong serve that people called 'Missile'. In 2016, he played in the big Wimbledon final but lost to Andy Murray. He also reached the top three in the world rankings that year. Raonic said he feels lucky because he got to live his dream of playing tennis since he was eight years old. He played his last match at the 2024 Olympics. Now, he is excited to try new things in life and will work hard just like he did in tennis.

background_read: Tennis is a sport where players hit a ball over a net. Professional tennis players compete in tournaments around the world, like Wimbledon and the Olympics. Retirement means stopping a job or sport, often after many years. Milos Raonic is a Canadian player known for his powerful serves, which helped him reach high rankings and big finals.
Article_Structure: WHO: Milos Raonic, a Canadian tennis player
WHAT: He announced his retirement from tennis
WHERE: He played in tournaments worldwide, including Wimbledon and the Olympics
WHY: He feels lucky to have lived his dream and is ready for new challenges

perspectives.description: Raonic sees his career as a lucky opportunity to pursue his passion from childhood.
